scripts.debug:ActionsServiceFunction:getone:dev: npm run build:lambda:dev && cp .env.dev .env && sam local invoke ActionsServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event-action-get-one.json
scripts.debug:ActionsServiceFunction:list:dev: npm run build:lambda:dev && cp .env.dev .env && sam local invoke ActionsServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event-action-list.json
scripts.debug:ActionsServiceFunction:add:dev: npm run build:lambda:dev && cp .env.dev .env && sam local invoke ActionsServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event-action-add.json
scripts.debug:ActionsServiceFunction:update:dev: npm run build:lambda:dev && cp .env.dev .env && sam local invoke ActionsServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event-action-update.json
scripts.debug:ActionsServiceFunction:invoke:dev: npm run build:lambda:dev && cp .env.dev .env && sam local invoke ActionsServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event-action-invoke.json
scripts.deploy:package:dev: export $(cat .env.dev | xargs) && npm run build:lambda:dev && npm run package:lambda && npm run deploy:package:action-service
scripts.deploy:package:test: export $(cat .env.test | xargs) && npm run build:lambda:dev && npm run package:lambda && npm run deploy:package:action-service
